Summary: Saw a bright ball of light - maybe a comment cross
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Peabody
There were no other sightings in Peabody on or around September 6th 2001
divs: Sighting Details We were driving on Rt128 heading South just beforeRt1 exit. Noticed a bright object in the sky and first thought it was anairplane. It was moving very quickly and very bright and had a vapor trail. Itwas heading North-North East. We saw it for at least 2min. It didnt appear tohave a strobe light like airplanes do. It moved in what seemed to be a straightflight path and did not appear to change altitude. It was a steady movement anda section of the vapor trail remained iluminated for at least 10min afterpassing. It disappeared very quickly in the direction of North-NorthEast. WAAFradion station out of Boston had people calling from Rhode Island and Nashua NewHampshire stating they saw this also. The DJs reported it as a comet. We arenot sure what this was.
